name: Unraid API Check
description: Checks if the Unraid web API responds at http://localhost/update.htm and reports server status.
check_cmd: if curl -fsS --max-time 5 http://localhost/update.htm 2>/dev/null | grep -q up; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi
fix_cmd: echo '⚠️ Unraid web API not responding — manual server or web service restart required.'
verify_cmd: if curl -fsS --max-time 5 http://localhost/update.htm 2>/dev/null | grep -q up; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
